programme.title: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp
programme.desc: After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom
programme.desc: With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom
programme.desc: Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back! / Dora and Boots meet Vicky the Vicuna who is missing her magic flute that she needs to go back to the Cloud Kingdom.

programme.title: Mail Truck Blaze
programme.desc: When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: Boris / Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Legendary Loot / Yup Day
programme.desc: After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Sherman in the Middle
programme.desc: Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters.

programme.title: Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends / Pups Save the Rainbow
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. // In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color. It's up to the pups to restore color to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Pups and the Trouble with Turtles
programme.desc: Tons of baby turtles start to pop up all over town and it's up to Ryder and the Pups to get them back to their pond.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Cafe / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Cafe Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Run Cynthia Run / Dora In Space
programme.desc: Dora and Boots get help from Carmelo the Condor to fix their friend's running shoes in time for the rainforest race! // Dora and Boots rescue Tico from space after his spaceship falls apart!

programme.title: Boris / Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: I'm Not A Barbababy Anymore / Roboxman
programme.desc: No! It's over! Barbidur is no longer a baby, he's a big boy now! // The barbababies are going to the hypermarket for the first time.

programme.title: Tool Duel
programme.desc: Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.title: Bouncy Tires
programme.desc: When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of "Super Bouncy Tires," he bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to experiment to find a substance adhesive enough to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.title: Pups Save the Big Nightlight
programme.desc: Humdinger and Kitties take the lighthouse from Seal Island.

programme.title: Pups Save Captain Crinkle Cut
programme.desc: Alex's french-fry costume gets him carried off by a flock of hungry seagulls.

programme.title: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata
programme.desc: Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Pups Save the Glasses
programme.desc: Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Hotel / The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail
programme.desc: Builder Cove gets its first hotel when Farmer Zoe's cousin Hadley comes to visit. But will Hadley approve of the new hotel?// After a hiking trail mix-up confuses everyone going to Mr. Ducky-Doo's birthday party, the pups help them get back on track.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Kangaroo Safari / The Crew Plays In The Construction Games
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew build a kangaroo safari for Lucas and Lily right in the Bark Yard... until their construction kangaroo hops away! // Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew to compete in the ultimate build-off: Builder Cove's first Construction Games!

programme.title: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples
programme.desc: Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.

programme.title: The Danceathon / What Goes Up
programme.desc: Lannie visits Carnivore Cove and joins Baby and his friends for a dance marathon. // Baby is thrilled to have a new bubbaloon pal until he faces the possibility of losing it.

programme.title: Saltwater Studios / Sand Crabby
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends are asked to perform at a music festival, they can't decide which genre of song to play. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson solve a crabby mystery.

programme.title: George's Balloon
programme.desc: George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Pirate Treasure
programme.desc: Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Grampy Rabbit in Space
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa's Circus
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: The Fish Pond
programme.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: The Olden Days
programme.desc: Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Snowy Mountain
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Muddy Puddles
programme.desc: It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen
programme.desc: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup
programme.desc: The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Winter Wonderland / The Crew Builds A Giant Snow Squirrely Whirly
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew work together to transform Builder Cove's beach boardwalk into a bright, festive winter wonderland. // When a snow day gets in the way of Motor & Mix's Super Squirrely Whirly plans, Rubble & Crew do what they do best... build!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash
programme.desc: Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution. // Rubble & Crew use their construction skills to convert the super car wash and clean Farmer Zoe's sticky farm animals.

programme.title: Pups Save the Big Nightlight
programme.desc: Humdinger and Kitties take the lighthouse from Seal Island.

programme.title: Pups Save Captain Crinkle Cut
programme.desc: Alex's french-fry costume gets him carried off by a flock of hungry seagulls.

programme.title: Pups Take in a Runaway Kitty / Pups Save the Cheese Goat
programme.desc: Rocky Kitty runs away to join the Paw Patrol, he becomes a hero when he helps rescue Humdinger and the kitties // When Digi and Tal confuse a request for goat cheese and create a goat out of cheese instead, they wind up the target of a hungry eagle.

programme.title: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thesee", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway
programme.desc: It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline
programme.desc: The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail. But Rubble & Crew, finds a construction solution.

programme.title: Partly Claudia / Ranita's Magic Stripes
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide. / Boots gets a case of Tickle Tail that Ranita the Frog can cure if she gets her magic stripes by helping friends around the Rainforest.

programme.title: The Super Skateboard
programme.desc: It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffle. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off
programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Smoothie Day
programme.desc: As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Pups Save Captain Crinkle Cut

programme.title: Pups Save the Camping Trip
programme.desc: Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol.

programme.desc: Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Going Boating
programme.desc: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Mr Bull in a China Shop
programme.desc: While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Fruit
programme.desc: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.desc: Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.desc: Customers battle in a mall while chaos erupts on a baseball field. A civilian helps a tired cop, and an angry customer erupts in a fast-food outlet.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.
